casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Harper, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Harper (1994), 70 Ohio St.3d 398.]

(No. 94-470 Submitted August 31, 1994 Decided September 28, 1994.) Timothy A. Oliver, Warren County Prosecuting Attorney, Carolyn A. Duvelius and Kenneth A. Ewing, Assistant Prosecuting Attorneys, for appellee. Rittgers & Mengle, Charles H. Rittgers and W. Andrew Hasselbach, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. Shindler (1994), 70 Ohio St.3d 54, 636 N.E.2d 319, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
